content.rendered:
Maple Ave Morning Announcements 

September 10th, 2025 

Today is a “B” Day  

  •  After school help and clubs start on Monday, September 15th.   

 

Today’s Lunch is Macaroni & Cheese, a corn muffin, breaded broccoli bites, warm cinnamon apples, and a chocolate chip cookie  

 

Be Respectful   Be Responsible   Be Safe   Be Kind   Be Here 

Make it a great day or not. The choice is yours!
